entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is a person who is trying to hide something from Pansy. He points his wand at Harry and paralyses him.

entities.name: pansy
entities.description: Pansy is someone that Malfoy wants to hide something from.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is being paralysed by Malfoy's wand. He is revealed when the Invisibility Cloak is trapped beneath him.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: Goyle is someone whose trunk hits Harry, causing him to be paralysed by Malfoy's wand.

entities.name: zabini
entities.description: Zabini is a person who comes back and causes something white (the Invisibility Cloak) to flash through the air.

relationships.description: Malfoy is hiding something from Pansy, as mentioned in the text 'What had Malfoy wanted to hide from Pansy?'
Malfoy points his wand at Harry and paralyses him, as mentioned in the text 'Without warning, Malfoy pointed his wand at Harry...'
Goyle's trunk hits Harry, causing him to be paralysed by Malfoy's wand.
Zabini comes back and causes the Invisibility Cloak to flash through the air, as mentioned in the text '...and I thought I saw some thing white flash through the air after Zabini came back...'
